Name: The Entwistle
Ingredients: 60 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: STIR calvados with maple syrup to dissolve syrup. Add other ingredients, STIR with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Review: Complex and bittersweet with a cidery base courtesy of apple spirit and apple liqueur with sweet maple syrup balancing bitter liqueur.
History: Updated from a drink discovered in 2010 at Rye in San Francisco, USA.
